Short coat in a sturdy weave. Opening with a scalloped trim at the front and front pockets. Lined.
Yoga jumpsuit in fast-drying functional fabric with narrow shoulder straps, a decorative hole pattern at the top and a racer back. Seam at the waist with an opening and sewn-in lacing at the hems.

Boots in imitation leather and sturdy jersey. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.

Padded parka with a detachable, pile-lined hood with a sewn-on faux fur trim that can be folded up, and a press-stud at the back. Stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with toggles at the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, and visible zips in the sides. Quilted inner lining.

Padded jacket with a padded, lined, faux fur-trimmed hood, zip down the front and seam at the waist. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, zipped side pockets and zips at the sides. Lined, partly in faux fur.
